newsitem.title: JAPAN: Japan Jan refinery operating rate up yr/yr,mth/mth.
newsitem.headline: Japan Jan refinery operating rate up yr/yr,mth/mth.

text.p: The utilisation rate of Japanese oil refineries was at 89.3 percent in January, up from 88.6 percent in the same month in 1996, and up from 84.9 percent in December, the trade ministry said on Monday.
Crude throughput totalled 23.3 million kilolitres (kl) in January, up 0.8 percent from the same month in 1996, and up 5.2 percent from December, the Ministry of International Trade and Industry said.
Japan's oil companies currently have a combined refining capacity of 5.3 million barrels-per-stream-day.
